      • postCreateRefund

        String postCreateRefund(String orderId,
                        String altRefundId,
                        List<RefundItemRec> items)
                 throws APIException,
                        JetException
        Merchant Initiated Refunds can be created using this API method
        Parameters:
        orderId - The Order ID you wish to create a refund for.
        altRefundId - The Alternative Refund ID that you must create for a refund.
        items - A list of items that are included in the refund from the order being refunded.
        Returns:
        refund authorization id
        Throws:
        APIException
        JetException
